# ----------------------------------------------------------------------
# start of Imakefile

PGPLOT_LIBDIR = /usr/local/pgplot

PGPLOT_INCDIR = /usr/local/pgplot

CFITSIO_LIBDIR = $(HOME)/Phase_Screen/local/lib

CFITSIO_INCDIR = $(HOME)/Phase_Screen/local/include

LOCAL_LIBDIR = $(HOME)/Phase_Screen/local/lib

LOCAL_INCDIR = $(HOME)/Phase_Screen/local/include

LOCAL_LIBRARIES = $(XAWLIB) $(XMULIBONLY) $(XTOOLLIB) $(XPMLIB) $(XLIB) -L/usr/X11/lib 	-L$(PGPLOT_LIBDIR) -lcpgplot -lpgplot 	-L$(CFITSIO_LIBDIR) -lcfitsio 	-L$(LOCAL_LIBDIR) -lmathtools -lastrotools -lm

CCOPTIONS = -O3

CDEBUGFLAGS =

F77 = g77

CC = gcc

CCLINK = $(F77)

TOP_INCLUDES =  -I./include 		-I$(LOCAL_INCDIR) -I$(PGPLOT_INCDIR) -I$(CFITSIO)

EXTRA_LDOPTIONS = -I./include 		-I$(LOCAL_INCDIR) -I$(PGPLOT_INCDIR) -I$(CFITSIO)

SRCS =  aris.c 	parameter_setup.c 	sim_setup.c 	menu_config.c 	fits_data_select.c 	comment_init.c 	comment_disp.c 	tvget_param.c 	off_button.c 	on_button.c 	toggle_button.c 	char_copy.c 	source_position.c 	atmospheric_fluctuation.c 	Gaussian_Noise1D.c 	Gaussian_noise_check.c 	turbulent_phase_screen.c 	phase_screen_check.c 	TEC_TID.c 	array_config.c 	SSF_disp.c 	position_on_screen.c 	azel_disp.c 	single_secz.c 	airmass.c 	fitsidi_save.c 	brightness_disp.c 	source_model.c 	ADAF_disk.c 	VSOP2_logo.c 	jet_cjet.c 	PA_rotate.c 	delay_rate_disp.c 	delay_rate_ordinate_axis.c 	earth_eqlips.c 	fft2d.c 	fringe_disp.c 	wfft2d.c 	get_vis.c 	visibility_calc.c 	vis_smoothing.c 	input_star_position.c 	output_star_position.c 	str_init.c 	orbit_disp.c 	peak_normarize.c 	spherical_geometry.c 	pg_color_bar.c 	pg_color_map.c 	position2uvw.c 	EPL_disp.c 	station_select.c 	baseline_number.c 	wave_select.c 	random_val.c 	diff.c 	imager.c 	phase_reference.c 	qlook_imager.c 	seed_random.c 	set_color.c 	spacecraft_position.c 	snrcal.c 	parabo.c 	uvw_calc.c 	uv_display.c

        PROGRAM = aris

all:: aris

aris: $(OBJS) $(DEPLIBS)
	$(RM) $@
	$(CCLINK) -o $@ $(LDOPTIONS) $(OBJS) $(LOCAL_LIBRARIES) $(LDLIBS)  $(EXTRA_LOAD_FLAGS)

install:: aris
	@if [ -d $(DESTDIR)$(BINDIR) ]; then \
		set +x; \
	else \
		if [ -h $(DESTDIR)$(BINDIR) ]; then \
			(set -x; rm -f $(DESTDIR)$(BINDIR)); \
		fi; \
		(set -x; $(MKDIRHIER) $(DESTDIR)$(BINDIR)); \
	fi
	$(INSTALL) $(INSTALLFLAGS) $(INSTPGMFLAGS)  aris $(DESTDIR)$(BINDIR)/aris

all:: aris.$(MANSUFFIX).html

aris.$(MANSUFFIX).html: aris.$(MANNEWSUFFIX)
	$(RM) aris.$(MANSUFFIX).html aris.$(MANSUFFIX)-html
	$(RMAN) $(RMANOPTIONS) < aris.$(MANNEWSUFFIX) \
	  > aris.$(MANSUFFIX)-html && $(MV) aris.$(MANSUFFIX)-html $@

install.man:: aris.$(MANSUFFIX).html
	@if [ -d $(DESTDIR)$(DOCHTMLDIR) ]; then \
		set +x; \
	else \
		if [ -h $(DESTDIR)$(DOCHTMLDIR) ]; then \
			(set -x; rm -f $(DESTDIR)$(DOCHTMLDIR)); \
		fi; \
		(set -x; $(MKDIRHIER) $(DESTDIR)$(DOCHTMLDIR)); \
	fi
	@(SUF=`expr $(MANSUFFIX) \: '\(.\)'`; \
	 set -x; \
	 $(INSTALL) $(INSTALLFLAGS) $(INSTMANFLAGS) aris.$(MANSUFFIX).html $(DESTDIR)$(DOCHTMLDIR)/aris.$$SUF.html)

cleandir::
	$(RM) aris.$(MANSUFFIX).html aris.$(MANSUFFIX)-html

all:: aris.$(MANNEWSUFFIX)

aris.$(MANNEWSUFFIX): aris.$(MANSRCSUFFIX)
	$(RM) $@
	cd `dirname aris` && \
		$(LN) `basename aris.$(MANSRCSUFFIX)` `basename $@`

cleandir::
	$(RM) aris.$(MANNEWSUFFIX)

install.man:: aris.$(MANNEWSUFFIX)
	@if [ -d $(DESTDIR)$(MANDIR) ]; then \
		set +x; \
	else \
		if [ -h $(DESTDIR)$(MANDIR) ]; then \
			(set -x; rm -f $(DESTDIR)$(MANDIR)); \
		fi; \
		(set -x; $(MKDIRHIER) $(DESTDIR)$(MANDIR)); \
	fi
	$(INSTALL) $(INSTALLFLAGS) $(INSTMANFLAGS) aris.$(MANNEWSUFFIX) $(DESTDIR)$(MANDIR)/aris.$(MANSUFFIX)

depend::
	$(DEPEND) $(DEPENDFLAGS) -- $(ALLDEFINES) $(DEPEND_DEFINES) -- $(SRCS)

lint:
	$(LINT) $(LINTFLAGS) $(SRCS) $(LINTLIBS)
lint1:
	$(LINT) $(LINTFLAGS) $(FILE) $(LINTLIBS)

cleandir::
	$(RM) aris

# ----------------------------------------------------------------------
# common rules for all Makefiles - do not edit

.c.i:
	$(RM) $@
	 	$(CC) -E $(CFLAGS) $(_NOOP_) $*.c > $@

.SUFFIXES: .s

.c.s:
	$(RM) $@
	 	$(CC) -S $(CFLAGS) $(_NOOP_) $*.c

emptyrule::

cleandir::
	$(RM) *.CKP *.ln *.BAK *.bak *.o core errs ,* *~ *.a .emacs_* tags TAGS make.log MakeOut  "#"*

Makefile::
	-@if [ -f Makefile ]; then set -x; \
	$(RM) Makefile.bak; $(MV) Makefile Makefile.bak; \
	else exit 0; fi
	$(IMAKE_CMD) -DTOPDIR=$(TOP) -DCURDIR=$(CURRENT_DIR)

tags::
	$(TAGS) -w *.[ch]
	$(TAGS) -xw *.[ch] > TAGS

man_keywords::

html_index::
	$(HTMLINDEXCMD) $(DESTDIR)$(DOCHTMLDIR)

clean:: cleandir

distclean:: cleandir

# ----------------------------------------------------------------------
# empty rules for directories that do not have SUBDIRS - do not edit

install::
	@echo "install in $(CURRENT_DIR) done"

install.man::
	@echo "install.man in $(CURRENT_DIR) done"

install.sdk::
	@echo "install.sdk in $(CURRENT_DIR) done"

Makefiles::

includes::

depend::

distclean::
	$(RM) Makefile Makefile.dep

# ----------------------------------------------------------------------
# dependencies generated by makedepend
